amendment.description: To appropriate an additional $10,000,000 for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide for POW/MIA identification within the Defense Personnel Accounting Agency, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3706 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 85 - 0. Record Vote Number: 187.

action.text: Amendment SA 3706 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Fischer to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5688-5689; text: CR S5689) To appropriate an additional $10,000,000 for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide for POW/MIA identification within the Defense Personnel Accounting Agency, and to provide an offset.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3706 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 85 - 0. Record Vote Number: 187.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3706 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 85 - 0. Record Vote Number: 187.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3706 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Fischer to Amendment SA 3695.
